Function Documentation

void iGeom_getArr2ndAdj ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
const iBase_EntityHandle *  entity_handles,
int  entity_handles_size,
int  order_adjacent_key,
int  requested_entity_type,
iBase_EntityHandle **  adj_entity_handles,
int *  adj_entity_handles_allocated,
int *  adj_entity_handles_size,
int **  offset,
int *  offset_allocated,
int *  offset_size,
int *  err 
)

Get "2nd order" adjacencies to an array of entities.

Get "2nd order" adjacencies to an array of entities, that is, from each entity, through other entities of a specified "bridge" dimension, to other entities of another specified "to" dimension.

Parameters:
instance  [in] iGeom instance handle
entity_handles  [in] Entities from which adjacencies are requested
entity_handles_size  [in] Number of entities whose adjacencies are requested
order_adjacent_key  [in] Bridge dimension for 2nd order adjacencies
requested_entity_type  [in] unknown
adj_entity_handles  [in,out] Adjacent entities
adj_entity_handles_allocated  [in,out] Allocated size of returned array
adj_entity_handles_size  [in,out] Occupied size of returned array
offset  [in,out] Offset[i] is offset into adj_entity_handles of 2nd order adjacencies of ith entity in entity_handles
offset_allocated  [in,out] Allocated size of offset array
offset_size  [in,out] Occupied size of offset array
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)

void iGeom_getArrAdj ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
const iBase_EntityHandle *  entity_handles,
int  entity_handles_size,
int  requested_entity_type,
iBase_EntityHandle **  adj_entity_handles,
int *  adj_entity_handles_allocated,
int *  adj_entity_handles_size,
int **  offset,
int *  offset_allocated,
int *  offset_size,
int *  err 
)

Get entities of specified type adjacent to entities.

Get entities of specified type adjacent to entities. Specified type must be value in the iBase_EntityType enumeration. offset(i) is index of first entity in adjacentEntityHandles array adjacent to entity_handles[i].

Parameters:
instance  [in] iGeom instance handle
entity_handles  [in] Array of entity handles being queried
entity_handles_size  [in] Number of entities in entity_handles array
requested_entity_type  [in] Type of adjacent entities requested
adj_entity_handles  [in,out] Pointer to array of adjacentEntityHandles returned from function
adj_entity_handles_allocated  [in,out] Pointer to allocated size of adjacentEntityHandles array
adj_entity_handles_size  [in,out] Pointer to occupied size of adjacentEntityHandles array
offset  [in,out] Pointer to array of offsets returned from function
offset_allocated  [in,out] Pointer to allocated size of offset array
offset_size  [in,out] Pointer to occupied size of offset array
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)

void iGeom_getEnt2ndAdj ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
iBase_EntityHandle  entity_handle,
int  bridge_dimension,
int  to_dimension,
iBase_EntityHandle **  adjacent_entities,
int *  adjacent_entities_allocated,
int *  adjacent_entities_size,
int *  err 
)

Get "2nd order" adjacencies to an entity.

Get "2nd order" adjacencies to an entity, that is, from an entity, through other entities of a specified "bridge" dimension, to other entities of another specified "to" dimension.

Parameters:
instance  [in] iGeom instance handle
entity_handle  [in] Entity from which adjacencies are requested
bridge_dimension  [in] Bridge dimension for 2nd order adjacencies
to_dimension  [in] Dimension of adjacent entities returned
adjacent_entities  [in,out] Adjacent entities
adjacent_entities_allocated  [in,out] Allocated size of returned array
adjacent_entities_size  [in,out] Occupied size of returned array
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)

void iGeom_getEntAdj ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
iBase_EntityHandle  entity_handle,
int  to_dimension,
iBase_EntityHandle **  adj_entities,
int *  adj_entities_allocated,
int *  adj_entities_size,
int *  err 
)

Get entities of specified type adjacent to an entity.

Get entities of specified type adjacent to an entity. Specified type must be value in the iBase_EntityType enumeration.

Parameters:
instance  [in] iGeom instance handle
entity_handle  [in] Entity handle being queried
to_dimension  [in] unknown
adj_entities  [in,out] Pointer to array of adjacent entities returned from function
adj_entities_allocated  [in,out] Pointer to allocated size of adj_entities array
adj_entities_size  [in,out] Pointer to occupied size of adj_entities array
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)

void iGeom_isArrAdj ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
const iBase_EntityHandle *  entity_handles_1,
int  entity_handles_1_size,
const iBase_EntityHandle *  entity_handles_2,
int  entity_handles_2_size,
int **  is_adjacent_info,
int *  is_adjacent_info_allocated,
int *  is_adjacent_info_size,
int *  err 
)

Return whether entity pairs are adjacent.

Return whether entity pairs are adjacent, i.e. if entity_handles_1[i] is adjacent to entity_handles_2[i]. This function requires entity_handles_1_size and entity_handles_2_size to be equal.

Parameters:
instance  [in] iGeom instance handle
entity_handles_1  [in] First array of entities
entity_handles_1_size  [in] Number of entities in first array
entity_handles_2  [in] Second array of entities
entity_handles_2_size  [in] Number of entities in second array
is_adjacent_info  [in,out] Array of flags returned from function
is_adjacent_info_allocated  [in,out] Allocated size of flags array
is_adjacent_info_size  [in,out] Occupied size of flags array
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)

void iGeom_isEntAdj ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
iBase_EntityHandle  entity_handle1,
iBase_EntityHandle  entity_handle2,
int *  are_adjacent,
int *  err 
)

Return whether two entities are adjacent.

Return whether two entities are adjacent.

Parameters:
instance  [in] iGeom instance handle
entity_handle1  [in] First entity queried
entity_handle2  [in] Second entity queried
are_adjacent  [out] If returned non-zero, entities are adjacent, otherwise they are not
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
